settings.sub_title:
Kiwi Catering Supplies is a New Zealand owned and operated company bringing you the best prices on nitrous oxide cream chargers, cream whippers and other catering supplies.

We are one of the most established suppliers of cream chargers and whippers in the New Zealand market.

We are committed to offering the very best prices and service to our customers. If you find cream chargers or whippers stocked by one of our competitors, we'll beat it according to our Price Beat Guarantee.
We also understand that when you buy our products, you want to receive them as quickly as possible. That's why we offer same-day shipping. Find out more in our Shipping Policy.

settings.terms_condi_point: There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable.
If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text.
All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet.
It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable.
The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.

It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.

settings.accordion_ans1: Cream chargers are filled with compressed nitrous oxide. They are used with a cream dispenser for whipping cream.

settings.accordion_title: Are your cream chargers the same quality as other brands?
settings.accordion_ans1:
Absolutely! Our cream chargers have a range of internationally recognised certifications and approvals including CE, FDA, ISO 9001, ISO 14001 and ISO 45001.

You can buy with confidence that you are purchasing cream chargers of the very best quality.

We offer same-day delivery in central Auckland for a $25.00 fee. Post codes that are covered by this policy are:
  • 1010 Auckland Central
  • 1011 Ponsonby & Herne Bay
  • 1021 Grey Lynn
  • 1022 Point Chevalier
  • 1023 Epsom
  • 1024 Mount Eden
  • 1050 Remuera
  • 1051 Greenlane & Ellerslie
  • 1060 Mount Wellington
  • 1061 Penrose
  • 1062 Otahuhu
  • 1071 Kohimarama & Mission Bay
  • 1072 Saint Johns & Glen Innes
  • 2010 Pakuranga
To make an order for same-day delivery, select Same-Day Delivery Auckland Central as your shipping method at checkout. You will then receive a message from us with details about the expected delivery time. If your post code/suburb is not listed above, please contact us as we may be able to arrange to deliver to you same-day.

We use the overnight courier service and send out all orders received before 2PM on the same-day. This means that most of our customers receive their order the day after they have placed it on weekdays.

Courier delays, especially during busy times of the year, are unfortunately beyond our control. This is why we tell customers to please allow up to 3 working days to receive their order.

There may be further delays for South Island orders or for rural delivery. If this applies to you, please allow up to 5 working days to receive your order. You can find out more in our shipping policy .

settings.accordion_title: Can I get my order delivered on a Saturday?
settings.accordion_ans1:
Customers have the option to select Saturday Delivery at checkout if they need their order to be delivered in time for a weekend event.

We recommend that customers who place their order on a Thursday or Friday use this feature if they have concerns about receiving their order on time. Unfortunately we cannot guarantee delivery will occur as expected as the courier companies we use are beyond our control.

Customers in central Auckland also have the option of selecting Same-Day Delivery on Saturdays if their delivery address is in one of the postcodes listed above. Please contact us before placing a Same Day Delivery order on weekends or public holidays as we may not be available to dispatch your order.

settings.accordion_title: Does your store allow orders to be picked up?
settings.accordion_ans1:
We do allow pick ups in Saint Johns on weekdays during business hours. Simply make an order online then select Pick Up as your shipping method. You will then receive a notification when your order is ready to pick up.

Sometimes we also allow pick ups outside of business hours and on weekends and public holidays. Please contact us to arrange this.

settings.accordion_title: How do I dispose of cream chargers?
settings.accordion_ans1: All cream chargers are 100% recyclable in New Zealand. Please recycle all empty chargers after use. However, do not dispose of unused cream chargers.

settings.accordion_title: Do you provide bulk discounts on your products?
settings.accordion_ans1: If you are wanting wholesale quantities of cream chargers or cream dispensers, get in touch with us and we are happy to discuss this with you. We offer a best price guarantee so we will beat the price of our competitors on similarly stocked products subject to certain terms and conditions.

settings.accordion_title: What is your best price guarantee?
settings.accordion_ans1: We offer a best price guarantee on our cream chargers and cream dispensers so we will beat the price of our competitors subject to certain terms and conditions. Find out more here .

settings.sub_title: We are committed to offering the very best prices and service to our customers. If you find cream chargers or whippers stocked by one of our competitors, we'll beat it according to our Price Beat Guarantee.
We also understand that when you buy our products, you want to receive them as quickly as possible. That's why we offer same-day shipping. Find out more in our Shipping Policy.

settings.section_best_desc:
WE'RE A CLASSIC KIWI FAMILY BUSINESS BASED IN AUCKLAND, NEW ZEALAND. SINCE 2019, WE'VE BEEN WORKING HARD TO BUILD A STRONG PRESENCE IN THE CATERING SUPPLIES INDUSTRY ACROSS NEW ZEALAND. OUR COMMITMENT TO EFFICIENCY, QUALITY, AND TOP-NOTCH CUSTOMER SERVICE HAS BEEN THE BACKBONE OF OUR SUCCESS.

IN OUR EARLY YEARS, WE STOCKED POPULAR GLOBAL BRANDS, BUT AS OUR BUSINESS EVOLVED, OUR FOCUS SHIFTED TO OFFERING ECO-FRIENDLY, HIGH-QUALITY ALTERNATIVES. NOW, OUR IN-HOUSE RANGE OF PALM LEAF PLATES AND BIRCH WOOD CUTLERY IS SETTING NEW STANDARDS IN THE INDUSTRY, PROVIDING EXCEPTIONAL QUALITY AT AN AFFORDABLE PRICE.

THROUGH YEARS OF WORKING CLOSELY WITH OUR SUPPLIERS, WE'VE ENSURED OUR PRODUCTS MEET THE HIGH EXPECTATIONS OF KIWIS. OUR PALM LEAF PLATES ARE NATURALLY SOURCED AND SUSTAINABLE.

SO, WHEN YOU CHOOSE PALM LEAF PLATES, YOU'RE GETTING THE BEST OF BOTH WORLDSA PREMIUM, ECO-CONSCIOUS PRODUCT THATS GENTLE ON BOTH THE PLANET AND YOUR WALLET.

settings.Retailer_text:
If you're a retailer or a wholesale customer interested in becoming a part of the Kiwi Catering Family, we extend a warm welcome and look forward to connecting with you. As we continue to expand our reach and make our high-quality products available across the nation, we believe in the strength of collaboration and are open to welcoming more members to our ever-growing family.

To express your interest, kindly take a moment to share your details by completing the form conveniently located on the right side of this page. We appreciate your enthusiasm and anticipate the opportunity to reach out and discuss how we can mutually benefit from a partnership. Thank you for considering joining us on this exciting journey!

settings.member_desc: To kick things off, we're dishing up a delicious summer mousse featuring some delicious fresh strawberries, cream, and a dash of icing sugar - Dead easy but bloody tasty!
Keen for a bit of a treat and an energy boost all rolled into on? Well, this coffee-rum cream charger concoction could be the perfect fit for you!
Alright folks, get ready to elevate your cocktail game with this electrifying Espresso Martini recipe! This isn't just a drink; it's a showstopper that'll have your guests talking for weeks.
When we talk about old-school cocktails, the Pina Colada is the Kingpin! Celebrating the epic bromance between Mr Coconut and Mr Pineapple. These two have been besties for ages!

You know, when it comes to the OG eggs Benny, it's just not the same without that classic hollandaise sauce. Whip up a batch at home, and you've got yourself a cream charger recipe that's destined for legendary status - it's so light, it practically floats off the plate!

When summers in full swing, a chilly cream charger recipe becomes as essential as jandals on the beach. And what could be more righteous than sipping on some iced coffee to keep you as cool as a cucumber and sharp as a pavlova knife?
Got a sweet tooth in the morning for your coffee? Well, youll likely get a kick out of this creamy, booze-infused evening escapade!

When it comes to salads, it's like olive oil is the ultimate wingman - mixing up the flavours and giving it some extra oomph. But here's the kicker: infuse that olive oil with some lemon, and you're taking those flavours on a joyride they'll never forget!

What sugary delight could possibly outdo a midnight munchie like a fluffy chocolate mousse? Add a dollop of whipped cream on there? Oh, you betcha! This cream charger recipe is so delectably creamy, it's like a cozy nightcap for your taste buds. It's our all-time fave, no doubt about it!

To all our vegan fans! We hear your calls for a plant-based cream charger recipe. on.ce you've nailed it, this lip smacking, dairy-free coconut whipped cream is going to be your trusty sidekick, whether you're pimping your ice cream or cozying up with some apple pie.

Experience the thrill of Kiwi Catering's Strawberry Daiquiri, a fresh take on the classic, crafted with our advanced cream chargers for a creamy, frothy twist. Each sip delivers a harmony of juicy strawberries, zesty lime, and smooth rum.

Dive into the vibrant world of cocktail innovation with Kiwi Catering's Strawberry Foam Margarita, a playful yet sophisticated twist on your beloved classic. This concoction isn't just a drink; it's a sensory experience, designed to dazzle and delight.

settings.title: SUMMER STRAWBERRY  MOUSSE
settings.text:
To kick things off, we're dishing up a delicious summer mousse featuring some delicious fresh strawberries, cream, and a dash of icing sugar - Dead easy but bloody tasty!
To begin, we present to you a simple mousse made with fresh strawberries, cream, and powdered sugar - so simple yet so delicious!


Ingredients:
  • 400g Fresh Strawberries
  • 75g Icing Sugar, Sieved
  • 150ml Double Cream

Accessories:
  • l Kiwi Catering Whipped Cream Dispenser (1000ml)
  • 2 Kiwi Catering Cream Chargers

Instructions:
  1. Set six strawberries aside for garnishing.
  2. Blend the remaining strawberries into a liquid puree, then sieve the puree to remove the seeds.
  3. Add the powdered sugar and blend the ingredients.
  4. Add the cream and stir - do not blend
  5. Pour the mixture into a cream dispenser and shake gently.
  6. Release the mousse into serving glasses.
  7. Decorate the mousse with the remaining strawberries.

settings.title: COFFEE WITH A RUM CREAM TOPPING
settings.text:
Keen for a bit of a treat and an energy boost all rolled into on? Well, this coffee-rum cream charger concoction could be the perfect fit for you!


Ingredients:
  • 3 cups Heavy Cream
  • 6 tbsp Rum
  • 6 tbsp Kahlua (or Tia Maria for less sugar)
  • 6 tbsp Powdered Sugar
  • l Cup of Coffee (however you take it)

Accessories:
  • l Kiwi Catering Whipped Cream Dispenser (1000ml)
  • 2 Kiwi Catering Cream Chargers

Instructions:
  1. Pour all the ingredients except the cup of coffee into the whipped cream dispenser.
  2. Charge the whipped cream dispenser with two cream chargers.
  3. Shake the cream dispenser 30 times.
  4. Make a cup of coffee according to your liking.
  5. Dispense the cream on top of the coffee.

settings.title: ESPRESSO MARTINI
settings.text:
Alright folks, get ready to elevate your cocktail game with this electrifying Espresso Martini recipe! This isn't just a drink; it's a showstopper that'll have your guests talking for weeks.


Ingredients:
  • 70ml Coffee Liqueur (or Kahlua will do)
  • 750ml Cold Brew Coffee
  • 40ml Vanilla Syrup
  • 140ml Vodka
  • Coffee Beans to decorate

Accessories:
  • l Kiwi Catering Whipped Cream Dispenser (1000ml)
  • 2 Kiwi Catering Cream Chargers

Instructions:
  1. Start with a fresh, strong shot of espresso. Let it cool slightly
  2. In a shaker, combine the cooled espresso, vodka, coffee liqueur, and Vanilla syrup. Shake it up! (If you don't have a shaker just use a whisk and a bowl)
  3. Pour the mixture into a cream charger dispenser, charge both cream chargers, and give it a good shake to infuse.
  4. Dispense into martini glasses. The nitrous oxide will create a beautiful, creamy foam on top.
  5. Finish with a few coffee beans or a light dusting of cocoa powder.

This Espresso Martini is not just a cocktail; it's a sensory experience. The nitrous infusion adds a velvety texture that complements the rich espresso and spirits, creating a luxurious drink that's both a feast for the eyes and a delight for the palate. Enjoy responsibly and prepare to be the toast of the town!

settings.title: PINACOLADA
settings.text:
When we talk about old-school cocktails, the Pina Colada is the Kingpin! Celebrating the epic bromance between Mr Coconut and Mr Pineapple. These two have been besties for ages!


Ingredients:
  • 2/3 Cup Coconut Milk
  • l Cup Diced Pineapple
  • Cup Fresh Pineapple Juice
  • 150ml White Rum
  • Cup Vanilla Ice Cream
  • Some Pineapple Slices for Garnishing
  • Coconut Flakes for garnishing (optional)

Accessories:
  • l Kiwi Catering Whipped Cream Dispenser (1000ml)
  • 2 Kiwi Catering Cream Chargers

Instructions:
  1. Combine the diced pineapple with half of the juice in a bowl.
  2. Add the rum and blend the ingredients well.
  3. Place the mixture into the fridge for 2 hours to allow the ingredients to infuse.
  4. Blend the coconut cream with the left over syrup and vanilla ice cream at maximum speed for l minute, then strain the contents.
  5. Place the mixture into a whipped cream dispenser, charge it with two cream chargers and place the cream dispenser in the fridge for an hour to cool.
  6. Serve the pina colada in a chilled cocktail glass; add some pure coconut cream to the glass then release the pineapple mixture on top and stir. Finally garnish with some fresh pinapple slices and flaked coconut.

settings.title: HOLLANDAISE SAUCE
settings.text:
You know, when it comes to the OG eggs Benny, it's just not the same without that classic hollandaise sauce. Whip up a batch at home, and you've got yourself a cream charger recipe that's destined for legendary status - it's so light, it xactically floats off the plate!


Ingredients:
  • 200g Butter
  • 4 Egg Yolk
  • l tbsp Lemon Juice
  • l tbsp Vinegar
  • l tbsp White Wine
  • l egg

Accessories:
  • l Kiwi Catering Whipped Cream Dispenser (1000ml)
  • 2 Kiwi Catering Cream Chargers

Instructions:
  1. Melt the butter in a pan over low heat, then mix in the vinegar, white wine and lemon juice.
  2. Mix in the egg and four egg yolk.
  3. Stir continuously until the contents are well combined.
  4. Pour the mixture into a whipped cream dispenser and charge it with two cream chargers.
  5. Shake the cream dispenser 10 times and dispense on top of your dish of choice.

settings.title: kiwi catering ice coffee
settings.text:
When summers in full swing, a chilly cream charger recipe becomes as essential as jandals on the beach. And what could be more righteous than sipping on some iced coffee to keep you as cool as a cucumber and sharp as a pavlova knife?


Ingredients:
  • 1 Cup Whole Milk
  • Cup Heavy Cream
  • 2 tbsp Cane Sugar
  • 15g Instant Coffee Powder
  • 60ml Water
  • 5 Ice Cups

Accessories:
  • 1 Kiwi Catering Whipped Cream Dispenser (1000ml)
  • 2 Kiwi Catering Cream Chargers

Instructions:
  1. Bring the water to a boil and add the coffee powder. Mix the contents well and add 1 tbsp of sugar, stirring continuously.
  2. Remove the coffee brew from the heat and allow it to cool completely
  3. Mix 1 tbsp of the sugar together with the heavy cream.
  4. Pour the cream mixture into a cream dispenser and charge it twice.
  5. Shake the cream dispenser well and chill in the fridge for 60 minutes.
  6. Mix the remaining sugar with the milk until it has fully dissolved
  7. Cool the milk mixture in the refrigerator until needed.
Serve up:
  1. Add the sweet milk into a glass filled with ice.
  2. Pour the coffee mixture atop the milk and briefly stir.
  3. Release a hefty dollop of the whipped cream onto the milk and coffee mix and stir the ingredients together.
  4. Top it off with a final squirt of whipped cream.

settings.title: creamy hazelnut coffee topping
settings.text:
Got a sweet tooth in the morning for your coffee? Well, youll likely get a kick out of this creamy, booze-infused evening escapade!


Ingredients:
  • 1 Cup Heavy Cream
  • 1 Cup of coffee (as you take it)
  • Hazelnut pieces to garnish (optional)
  • 3 tbsp Icing Sugar
  • 3 tbsp Frangelico Liquor
  • 3 tbsp Kahlua (or Tia Maria for less sugar)

Accessories:
  • 1 Kiwi Catering Whipped Cream Dispenser (1000ml)
  • 2 Kiwi Catering Cream Chargers

Instructions:
  1. Whisk all of the ingredients together in a bowl.
  2. Place the ingredients into a cream dispenser and charge it with two cream chargers. Shake cream dispenser 10 times.
  3. Make your coffee as desired.
  4. Dispense the cream on top of the coffee.
  5. Garnish with hazelnut pieces.

settings.title: WHIPPED CHOCOLATE MOUSSE
settings.text:
What sugary delight could possibly outdo a midnight munchie like a fluffy chocolate mousse? Add a dollop of whipped cream on there? Oh, you betcha! This cream charger recipe is so delectably creamy, it's like a cozy nightcap for your taste buds. It's our all-time fave, no doubt Jbout it!


Ingredients:
  • 200g Finely Chopped Dark Chocolate
  • 150ml Double Cream 100ml Water
  • 40g Icing Sugar
  • Flake chocolate to garnish

Accessories:
  • 1 Kiwi Catering Whipped Cream Dispenser (1000ml)
  • 2 Kiwi Catering Cream Chargers

Instructions:
  1. Combine the chocolate, water and icing sugar in a medium sized bowl and place it on top of a pan filled with hot water on the stove top on low heat. Stir until everything melts.
  2. Remove the bowl from the heat and add the cream to the mixture and whisk until smooth.
  3. Pour the mixture into a whipped cream dispenser and charge the whipper with two chargers.
  4. Shake the cream dispenser 30 times and release into serving glasses
  5. Decorate as desired, with chocolate crumbles or flakes. Serve immediately.

settings.title: DAIRY-FREE COCONUT WHIPPED CREAM
settings.text:
To all our vegan fans! We hear your calls for a plant-based cream charger recipe. on . ce you've nailed it, this lip smacking, dairy-free coconut whipped cream is going to be your trusty sidekick, whether you're pimping your ice cream or cozying up with some apple pie


Ingredients:
  • 400ml Unsweetened Coconut Milk
  • 2 tbsp Coconut Oil
  • lOg Vanilla Extract
  • 2 tbsp of Icing Sugar
  • Pinch of Cinamon

Accessories:
  • l Kiwi Catering Whipped Cream Dispenser (1000ml)
  • 2 Kiwi Catering Cream Chargers

Instructions:
  1. Whisk all of the ingredients together in a bowl.
  2. Chill the mixture in the fridge for an hour then carefully pour it into a cream dispenser.
  3. Charge the cream dispenser with two cream chargers and briefly shake.
  4. Dispense on top of your snack or beverage of choice.

settings.title: LEMON-INFUSED OLIVE OIL
settings.text:
When it comes to salads, it's like olive oil is the ultimate wingman - mixing up the flavours and giving it some extra 00mph. But here's the kicker: infuse that olive oil with some lemon, and you're taking those flavors on a joyride they'll ,ever forget!


Ingredients:
  • 500ml of Olive Oil
  • 9 Lemons

Accessories:
  • l Kiwi Catering Whipped Cream Dispenser (1000ml)
  • 2 Kiwi Catering Cream Chargers

Instructions:
  1. zest the lemons
  2. Place the olive oil and lemon zest into a whipped cream dispenser and charge it with 2 cream charger capsules.
  3. Shake the cream dispenser a few times and allow the mixture to infuse for 5 minutes.
  4. Use the oil immediately or pour it into a glass jar for later usage.

settings.title: Strawberry Foam Margarita
settings.text:
Dive into the vibrant world of cocktail innovation with Kiwi Catering's Strawberry Foam Margarita, a playful yet sophisticated twist on your beloved classic. This concoction isn't just a drink; it's a sensory experience, designed to dazzle and delight. Using our cutting-edge cream charger and dispenser, we've infused the bold flavours of ripe strawberries, tangy lime, and smooth tequila with a velvety layer of frothy excitement. Perfect for anyone eager to elevate their social gatherings. This Strawberry Foam Margarita promises not just a sip, but an Instagrammable moment, blending tradition with a creamy, dreamy flair. Get ready to shake up your cocktail game with Kiwi Catering-where every drink is an adventure


Ingredients:
  • 680g Strawberries
  • 3-4 Tablespoons Cointreau
  • 80ml (1/3 Cup) Lime Juice
  • 1 Teaspoon Blue Curacao
  • 2 Cups of Crushed Ice Cubes
  • 160ml (2/3 Cup) of Tequila
  • 60g (1/4 Cup) Sugar
  • 1 Big Pinch of Salt

Accessories:
  • 1 Kiwi Catering Whipped Cream Dispenser (1000ml)
  • 2 Kiwi Catering Cream Chargers

Instructions:
  1. To create the strawberry foam, begin by hulling the strawberries and roughly pureeing them. Sweeten with sugar and gently simmer the mixture on low heat until it thickens into a coulis or jelly-like consistency. After straining, enhance it with 3-4 tablespoons of Cointreau and Blue Curacao for a vivid colour transformation. Split the mixture evenly in two.
  2. Pour one half into a whipped cream dispenser and charge it twice with nitrogen cream chargers, shaking thoroughly after each charge to ensure the mix is fully blended. After removing the charger, secure the lid and refrigerate until ready to serve. This foam can be stored in the fridge for up to a week, perfect for drinks or. as a decadent dessert topping.
  3. For the drink, combine crushed ice or ice cubes, tequila, lime juice, and a generous pinch of salt in a blender, adding the un-aerated half of the strawberry mix. Blend until smooth.
  4. Chill your cocktail glass in the fridge for 10 minutes, then prepare the rim with lime and dip in salt or sugar as preferred.
  5. To assemble, add a generous layer of strawberry foam to the bottom of the glass, followed by the blended tequila mix until full, Garnish with a lime slice.

settings.title: STRAWBERRY DAIQUIRI
settings.text:
Experience the thrill of Kiwi Catering's Strawberry Daiquiri, a fresh take on the classic, crafted with our advanced cream chargers for a creamy, frothy twist. Each sip delivers a harmony of juicy strawberries, zesty lime, and smooth rum. Perfect for a hot day if you are seeking Instagram-ready, sophisticated drinks. This daiquiri mixes tradition with innovation, making every occasion memorable. Cheers to Kiwi Catering's blend of flavour and flair!


Ingredients:
  • 2 Cups of Frozen Strawberries
  • 120ml (1/2 Cup) White Rum
  • 60ml (1/4 Cup) Lime Juice 60ml (1/4 Cup) Simple Syrup
  • Fresh Strawberries to garnish (Optional)
  • Fresh Lime to garnish (Optional)

Accessories:
  • 1 Kiwi Catering Whipped Cream Dispenser (1000ml)
  • 2 Kiwi Catering Cream Chargers

Instructions:
  1. Blend 2 cups of frozen strawberries, cup of white rum, cup of lime juice, and cup of simple syrup in a blender until smooth.
  2. Transfer the mixture into a whipped cream dispenser and securely tighten the lid.
  3. Insert two cream chargers into the dispenser and shake vigorously for a few seconds to infuse the mixture with nitrous oxide.
  4. Chill the mixture in the dispenser in the refrigerator for 30 minutes.
  5. Serve the mixture into cocktail glasses and garnish with a few fresh strawberries and lime slices.

settings.greeting_message: Hello! Let us know if you have a specific question, or give an idea of what you're looking for. We're happy to make recommendations.
